metadata.title: Nautica Men's Long Sleeve Small Plaid Button Down Shirt
features: Button-front styling with a buttoned collar long sleeves with adjustable double-button cuffs; pocket at chest
description: A time-saving style essential, this plaid shirt is ready at a moment's notice and keeps you cool all day, thanks to a cotton/tencel fabric blend. It's wrinkle resistant and has moisture-wicking properties for comfort and ease. From Nautica.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 1 Pounds", "Item model number": "W64107", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "November 12, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Nautica Sportswear (M&W)"}
